document_data.name: Argrum Blackspear
document_data.mainbody: '''Argrum Blackspear''' was a bandit leader in [[Tethyr]] in [[1358 DR]] who preyed upon the [[Trade Way]]. He once clashed with the [[Company of Eight]]. He tried to gather all bandit leaders of the area to form an alliance, hoping to also attract the Company of Eight so that he could eliminate them. He had a knack for organization, which made him a good leader.
